name: Cage of the Succubi
detailed_description:
One day, as our unfortunate hero was walking home, a demon stopped him on the road.

Without warning, she cast a spell on him, knocking him unconscious. When he awoke, he found himself in a mysterious castle.

There, a maid explained to him that he was captured in order to serve as a demon's slave.

Can our hero escape? Or is he doomed to serve for the rest of his life?

Features:

  • Dungeon crawling action RPG
  • Explore randomized dungeons
  • Gather materials and craft items
  • Power up and try to escape the demon's castle
about_the_game:
One day, as our unfortunate hero was walking home, a demon stopped him on the road.

Without warning, she cast a spell on him, knocking him unconscious. When he awoke, he found himself in a mysterious castle.

There, a maid explained to him that he was captured in order to serve as a demon's slave.

Can our hero escape? Or is he doomed to serve for the rest of his life?

Features:

  • Dungeon crawling action RPG
  • Explore randomized dungeons
  • Gather materials and craft items
  • Power up and try to escape the demon's castle
short_description: Having had a spell cast on him, our hero awakens in a mysterious castle. His only options are to serve the castle's lord as a slave, or with some help and hard work, escape.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

content_descriptors.notes: Cage of the Succubi contains strong language and partial nudity.
